item.title: DoubleTree by Hilton introduces a new MICE venue in Hainan
item.description: Hilton Worldwide and its DoubleTree by Hilton brand have opened a new resort in China called the DoubleTree Resort by Hilton Hainan - Qixianling Hot Spring. Situated within the Qixianling Hot Spring National Rainforest Park, the 254-room hotel is conveniently located 50 km from Lingshui Railway Station and 90 km from Sanya Phoenix International Airport. John Greenleaf, Global Head of DoubleTree by Hilton, emphasized the brand’s dedication to exceeding guest expectations.
